config.sep.title: Status Effect Plus Config
config.sep.potionGlint.tooltip: Whether or not apply enchantment glint to potions.
config.sep.xOffset.tooltip: X position in % of your screen (0-100.0).
config.sep.yOffset.tooltip: Y position in % of your screen (0-100.0).
config.sep.xAlignment.tooltip: Which side things should align to
config.sep.xArrangement.tooltip: Which side on X axis thing should append to
config.sep.yArrangement.tooltip: Which side on Y axis thing should append to
config.sep.xSpace.tooltip: Spacing between effects on X axis
config.sep.ySpace.tooltip: Spacing between effects on Y axis
config.sep.colorAuto.tooltip: Whether or not effect name and duration should be auto-colored
config.sep.invEffects.tooltip: How should effects be displayed when Inventory is opened
key.sep.name: SE+ Config
